summary: ON 21 FEBRUARY 2003, THE BOLT USED TO ATTACH THE RIGHT STRUT TO THE BODY AND THE REAR LIFTGATE BROKE NOT ALLOWING THE REAR LIFTGATE TO OPEN. A REVIEW OF RECALLS FOR MY MODEL OF VEHICLE (1992 PLYMOUTH VOYAGER) ON THE NHTSA COMPLAINTS DATABASE DISCLOSED RECALL # 97V079000. THE RECALL SUMMARY ADVISED THAT OWNER NOTIFICATIONS BEGAN DURING AUGUST 1997. I WAS NEVER NOTIFIED OF THIS RECALL.
